sys_script.name: Translate numbers

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_b9b50ead1b241810a51210a61a4bcb97
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_zoomec_sanitized_transcripts</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Translate numbers</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var Small = {
    'zero': 0,
    'one': 1,
    'two': 2,
    'three': 3,
    'four': 4,
    'five': 5,
    'six': 6,
    'seven': 7,
    'eight': 8,
    'nine': 9,
    'ten': 10,
    'eleven': 11,
    'twelve': 12,
    'thirteen': 13,
    'fourteen': 14,
    'fifteen': 15,
    'sixteen': 16,
    'seventeen': 17,
    'eighteen': 18,
    'nineteen': 19,
    'twenty': 20,
    'thirty': 30,
    'forty': 40,
    'fifty': 50,
    'sixty': 60,
    'seventy': 70,
    'eighty': 80,
    'ninety': 90
};

var Magnitude = {
    'thousand':     1000,
    'million':      1000000,
    'billion':      1000000000,
    'trillion':     1000000000000,
    'quadrillion':  1000000000000000,
    'quintillion':  1000000000000000000,
    'sextillion':   1000000000000000000000,
    'septillion':   1000000000000000000000000,
    'octillion':    1000000000000000000000000000,
    'nonillion':    1000000000000000000000000000000,
    'decillion':    1000000000000000000000000000000000,
};

var a, n, g;
//gs.info("TEXT2NUM: " + text2num('zero zero one two'));
// var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_zoomec_sanitized_transcripts');
// //gr.get('81fbb5eddb2458106b7eccfa139619a4')
// gr.query();

// while(gr.next()) {

	var script = current.clean_transcript + '';
	script = script.replace(/\n/g, ' ');
	script = script.replace(/\r/g, ' ');
	script = script.replace(/\./g, '');

	//gs.info("TRIMMED SCRIPT: " + script)
	var wordArr = script.split(' ');
	var numArr = [];
	var numString = '';

	for (var i = 0;i<wordArr.length;i++) {	
		if (Small[wordArr[i]] || Magnitude[wordArr[i]] || wordArr[i] == 'hundred' || wordArr[i] == 'zero') {
			//numArr.push(Small[wordArr[i]]);
			numString += ' ' + wordArr[i];
			// 		if (Small[wordArr[i]]) {
			// 			numString += ' ' + wordArr[i];
			// 		} else if (wordArr[i] == 'hundred') {
			// 			numString += ' ' + wordArr[i];
			// 		} else {
			// 			numString += ' ' + wordArr[i];
			// 		}

		} else if (!Small[wordArr[i]] && !Magnitude[wordArr[i]] ) {
			//gs.info("NUMSTRING PREPROCESS: " + numString)
			if (wordArr[i] == 'and' && numString != '' ) {
				numString += ' ' + wordArr[i];
			} else {
				if(numString != '') {
					numArr.push(numString);
				}
				numString = '';
			}
		}
	}

//gs.info("NUM ARR PREPROCESS: " + numArr)
	for (var j=0;j<numArr.length;j++) {
		var regex = new RegExp('(' + numArr[j] + ')', '');

		var nums = numArr[j].split(' ');
		var newStr = '';

		for (var k=0;k<nums.length;k++) {
			//gs.info("NUMS K: " + nums[k])

			if (Magnitude[nums[k]] || nums[k] == 'hundred') {
				newStr = (text2num(numArr[j])) + '';
				break;
			} else {
				if (nums[k] == 'zero') {
					newStr += '0';
				} else {
					newStr += (text2num(nums[k])) + '';
				}
			}
		}
		newStr = newStr + '';
		//gs.info("NEWSTR: " + newStr)
		//gs.info("NUMARR: " + numArr[j])
		script = script.replace(numArr[j], ' ' + newStr.slice(1));
	}
	//gs.info("***IMPROVED NUMBER ARR: " + numArr)
	current.clean_transcript = script;
	current.update();
	//gs.info("***TRANSLATED SCRIPT: " + script);
// }


function text2num(s) {
    a = s.toString().split(/[\s-]+/);
    n = 0;
    g = 0;
    a.forEach(feach);
	var stringNG = (n + g).toString();
    //gs.info("***TEXT TO NUM: " + stringNG);
	return stringNG;
}

function feach(w) {
    var x = Small[w];
    if (x != null) {
        g = g + x;
    }
    else if (w == "hundred") {
        g = g * 100;
    }
	else if (w == 'and') {
		//do nothing
	}
    else {
        x = Magnitude[w];
        if (x != null) {
            n = n + g * x;
            g = 0;
        }
        else { 
            //alert("Unknown number: "+w); 
        }
    }
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-03 08:08:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b9b50ead1b241810a51210a61a4bcb97</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Translate numbers</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ZoomEC" source="x_snc_zoomec">8255ef051b689410a51210a61a4bcbff</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ZoomEC">8255ef051b689410a51210a61a4bcbff</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b9b50ead1b241810a51210a61a4bcb97</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-03 09:42:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b9b50ead1b241810a51210a61a4bcb97"/></record_update>
